document:
<sentence id="s1" text="Methods: Analysis of publicly available microarray data of oral SCC revealed that AMACR was significantly upregulated in tumor tissue compared with normal mucosa.">
<sentence id="s2" text="Results: AMACR overexpression was significantly associated with advanced tumor status (li>P=0.001), advanced nodal status (li>P=0.036), increased vascular invasion (li>P=0.026) and increased perineural invasion (li>P=0.004).">
